meanings.definition: A group of men who participate in an endurance event involving swimming, biking, and running.
meanings.sent1: The ironmen trained hard for the triathlon.
meanings.sent2: I cheered for the ironmen as they crossed the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The ironmen joked about swimming with bikes on their backs.
meanings.sent4: The determination of the ironmen was as solid as iron itself.
meanings.sent5: The ironmen's dedication to the race was unwavering.

meanings.definition: Men who are strong, tough, and resilient.
meanings.sent1: The ironmen lifted heavy weights effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: People admired the ironmen for their strength.
meanings.sent3: The ironmen laughed off the challenge like it was nothing.
meanings.sent4: His willpower was as unyielding as that of the ironmen.
meanings.sent5: The ironmen's muscles were as sturdy as iron bars.

meanings.definition: Men who work in the iron industry.
meanings.sent1: The ironmen at the factory melted iron to make tools.
meanings.sent2: The town's economy relied on the hard work of the ironmen.
meanings.sent3: The ironmen joked about ironing their clothes at the iron factory.
meanings.sent4: The ironmen shaped the metal with precision and skill.
meanings.sent5: The clang of hammers echoed through the workshop where the ironmen toiled.
